attributes.additional_details:
It appears the Mayor defers to call centres blaming when procedures show should be contactable not just public meetings. NB Petitions on Care2USA & pledgebank uk All government is ignoring Chronically Sick & Disabled Act 1970

Right to Access
Target: The deregulated UK Government
Sponsored by: Julie Shrive on behalf of Blue Badge Holders
When Disabled Parking bays suspended they should be substituted as not enough & does not equate to ability to park on yellow lines in rest of country. This should be made law & Government responsible for monitoring as LAs not reasonable as franchised out.
